202_default.en: Your Google Apps account has been created or renamed and it will take a few moments to be processed. Your browser should automatically refresh or else you can login again at %UNTIL%.

202_created.en: Your Google Apps account is being created and it will take a few moments to complete. Your browser should automatically refresh or else you can login again at %UNTIL%.

202_renamed.en: Your Google Apps account has been renamed and it will take a few moments to complete the change. Your browser should automatically refresh or else you can login again at %UNTIL%.
